content.description: Climb Good Wood, then move out roof left via V8-V9 boulder problem. Finishes on cold shuts. Practice your dynos
Start on fallen tree. 5 bolts. Ends below roof before the 5.13+ extension.
content.location: Start on fallen tree on raised ground.

content.description: Traverse in from the left on jugs up to a very high first bolt on the underside of a small roof (this bolt may be too high for many stick clips). From there head up and left on overhanging jugs, passing a large block that juts out from the wall pointing to the right between bolts 2 and 3. Head roughly straight up on more overhanging jugs until the lip, where the route's hardest move waits to shut you down before you reach the anchors.
content.location:
The left-most route in this area. It is left of a section of brown rock that only appears to have one bolt in it, which is itself left of the waterfall cave. 

 You can also look for the small pine bush that will be poking you as you clean the anchors.

content.description:
This wall is between the left-most documented routes at Crazy House and the right end of Toomsuba. It consists of several routes around the outer edges of a cave which has a waterfall in its center.  

  If you know the real name or any other details, please submit page improvements or DM me and I'll update whatever needs it.
